duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service to drive sales and create a welcoming environment for customers.
Utilize product knowledge to assist customers in finding the right products and provide personalized recommendations.
Collaborate with team members to ensure a seamless customer experience and support daily store operations.
Share feedback, insights, and ideas with the management team to improve sales strategies and customer service.
Adhere to company values and maintain a professional and inclusive environment for all customers and team members.
